function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High levels of viral, bacterial, and fungal pathogens detected in the air samples from the surge ward","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and infection for patients and healthcare workers","Mitigation":"Implementing effective air filtration and purification systems, improving ventilation, and using personal protective equipment","Technologies":"High-efficiency particulate air (HEPA) filters, UV germicidal irradiation, and HVAC systems with high ventilation rates","People":"Patients, healthcare workers, and visitors","Owner":"Facility management, infection control teams, and healthcare administrators"},{"Description":"Detection of SARS-CoV-2 RNA in the air samples from the surge ICU","Impact":"Heightened risk of COVID-19 transmission and infection in the ICU environment","Mitigation":"Enhancing infection control measures, implementing strict isolation protocols, and using high-efficiency air filtration systems","Technologies":"HEPA filters, UV germicidal irradiation, and negative pressure ventilation in isolation rooms","People":"ICU patients, healthcare workers, and visitors","Owner":"ICU management, infection control teams, and healthcare administrators"}]}
